id: Detective Pikachu movie trailer is here: everything to know about live-action Pokémon
paragraph: The first trailer for Detective Pikachu is here. The live-action Pokémon feature film from Legendary and Warner Bros. stars Ryan Reynolds as the voice of Pikachu — a very sassy Pikachu, at that — along with corporeal performances from Justice Smith (Netflix’s The Get Down, Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom), Kathryn Newton (Big Little Lies, Halt and Catch Fire), Ken Watanabe, and more. Detective Pikachu is coming to theaters in May 2019, and the photorealistic, furry Pokémon look is... a lot.
